price: ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߫ ߟߐ߬ߦߙߌ ߕߍ߫ ߞߏߢߊ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߖߘߍ߬ߟߊ߬ߛߊߦߌ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߍ߬
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yanfaʿu alladhīna ẓalamū maʿdhiratuhum walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
translations: will be allowed to make amends
